backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with numerous ordered maps and rich domain types for journeys, locations, ratings, albums, schedules, bookmarks, and related data.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence for adding a no-op Map button in the Travelogue UI, mapping each feature to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of many frontend files and their roles, including maps, hooks, panels, managers, and UI components.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML bootstrap page loading the root React app and the SunCalc library.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring providers and rendering the LocationMapExplorer and BackendDebugger.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin interface handling journeys, schedules, and related forms with extensive UI controls and state management.
Exposes the backend canister actor to the browser console with debugging and admin-inspection utilities.
frontend/src/components/CityAlbumManager: Manages city albums with media upload, validation, social links, and album retrieval/modification logic.
frontend/src/components/CityloguePanel.t: Empty or placeholder file with no provided content.
frontend/src/components/GeonameGeographi: Manages city import, search, pagination, and CRUD operations with a form and file upload for Geonames data.
frontend/src/components/HeartRating.tsx: Displays a 10-heart rating widget with hover, partial-fill logic, and click-to-rate interactions.
frontend/src/components/InteractiveGlobe: Renders a 3D interactive globe with cities, borders, labels, animations, and optional time zone or flight features.
frontend/src/components/LocationInfoDial: Dialog for adding, updating, or deleting location photos with file validation and storage integration.
frontend/src/components/LoginPanel.tsx: Authentication panel using Internet Identity with status display, login/logout actions, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/MapComponent.tsx: Leaflet-based map showing travel spots, bookmarks, media, and schedule items with custom icons and popups.
frontend/src/components/MediaGalleryPopu: Displays photos, videos, and social media embeds in tabbed sections with utilities for parsing and embedding YouTube/Instagram links.
frontend/src/components/MusicAlbumManage: Provides UI for creating, editing, and deleting music albums and uploading songs with form dialogs and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/MusicPanel.tsx: Shows a music collection dialog that lists albums and songs, allowing users to select tracks for playback.
frontend/src/components/MusicPlayerBar.t: Implements an audio player bar that plays songs, handles playback controls, and syncs with selected tracks.
frontend/src/components/TimezoneManageme: Allows uploading, validating, storing, and manually executing timezone GeoJSON data using backend and IndexedDB.
Displays journeys and itineraries with collapsible schedules, editing tools, date formatting, and optional flight animations.
frontend/src/components/TravelSpotManage: UI for managing travel spots, including CRUD operations, media uploads, and social media links with city filtering and dialogs.
frontend/src/components/VibesPanel.tsx: Shows bookmarks and travel spots grouped by city and type, enhanced with spotType metadata and expandable sections.
frontend/src/components/WebsiteLayoutPan: Interface for modifying website layout preferences such as map settings, search defaults, and music player visibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides geocoding, country-name normalization, social media URL validation, and React Query hooks for backend-related data.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS variables for theming, including light/dark modes and music player color sets.
frontend/src/lib/solarCalculations.ts: Calculates solar declination and includes console-based test cases for verifying astronomical outputs.
frontend/src/lib/timezoneOffsetUtils.ts: Provides functions to compute timezone IDs for a given UTC offset using Intl API with quarter-hour precision.
frontend/src/lib/timezoneUtils.ts: Handles loading, caching, and validating timezone GeoJSON via IndexedDB and backend fallback.
frontend/src/lib/TzOverlayV2.ts: Implements timezone boundary rendering on a 3D globe with coordinate utilities, quarter-hour offset matching, and overlay group management.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Sets up the React app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CountryMapExplorer.ts: Placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/LocationMapExplorer.t: Main map explorer page handling 2D/3D views, location search, globe options, travel spot focus, and music/layout integration.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the placeholder Map button feature, requirements, and status.
